Text:
-- eng --
In this release, there is a problem connecting to GameRanger, I did update this release, but in this moment, I can not update the torrent file for this release on this site. Please find in internet, file with the new updates "Riva's Pack v2.0 for AoMTT 1.03.exe" (MD5: 3421E3ABC3C7AABF22E4568B64E73D3F) or package "Age of Mythology: The Titans 1.03 [Gold] [ENG / RUS] (+Riva's Pack v2.0)" which I updated 08 Nov 2011. Thank you.

-- rus --
V jetom relize sushestvuet oshibka podkljuchenija k GameRanger, ja sdelal obnovlenija dannogo reliza, no na dannyj moment, ja ne mogu obnovit' torrent fajl dlja dannogo reliza na jetom sajte. Pozhalujsta najdite v seti fajl s novymi obnovlenijami "Riva's Pack v2.0 for AoMTT 1.03.exe" (MD5: 3421E3ABC3C7AABF22E4568B64E73D3F) ili paket " Age of Mythology: The Titans 1.03 [Gold] [ENG/RUS] (+Riva's Pack v2.0)" kotoryj ja obnovil 08 Nov 2011
